column2: "Nah, but... I think it's a bit much to test your strength this time for the meteor."
"But I won't stop you if you want to do it. And if you don't, no one's going to get mad and I won't even call you Newbie."
"So how about this? You can do it if you want, but don't put yourself in danger. Make sure to give it everything you've got, but carefully!"
